reviews.text: We stayed at Hotel Slavija for two nights last week. Overall, it was a fine experience, as long as your expectations are kept in check. First, the pros: Great location, sea-view rooms had great views, decent shower, decent sized room (by European standards) and the people were nice enough, although not particularly friendly or helpful. The cons: The restaurant in front, although a lovely setting, had below-average food and service. The interior of the hotel is dim and a bit worn-down. And the trade-off for a sea-view room is the noise, as the ferries dock right outside and there can be quite a bit of revelling late into the night. Still, it's a good value.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, but not great
